question.title: Unable to parse file 'pom.xml'
question.body:
I'm working on a project with java 8 and maven. I need to upgrade the following jars to the latest version possible: drools-api-5.1.0.M1.jar, drools-core-5.1.0.M1.jar, drools-compiler-5.1.0.M1.jar, drools-templates-5.1.0.M1.jar and drools-persistence-jpa-5.1.0.M1.jar. I have upgraded all the jars to 7.74.1.Final version since higher versions requires java 11 or higher. I have the following method:

public static KnowledgeBase createKnowledgeBase(String rule) {
    KnowledgeBuilder kBuilder = KnowledgeBuilderFactory.newKnowledgeBuilder();
    Reader rdr = new StringReader(rule);
    kBuilder.add(ResourceFactory.newReaderResource(rdr), ResourceType.DRL);

    if (kBuilder.hasErrors()) {
        throw new RuntimeException(kBuilder.getErrors().toString());
    }
    KnowledgeBase knowledgeBase = KnowledgeBaseFactory.newKnowledgeBase();
    knowledgeBase.addKnowledgePackages(kBuilder.getKnowledgePackages());
    return knowledgeBase;
}

But when I run the application and executes the first line I get this error "Unable to instantiate service for class org.drools.builder.KnowledgeBuilderFactoryService". Then investigating the issue I found out I had to change the method for something like this:

public static KieSession createKieSessionFromDRL(String drl) {
        KieServices kieServices = KieServices.Factory.get();

        KieFileSystem kieFileSystem = kieServices.newKieFileSystem();
        kieFileSystem.write(kieServices.getResources().newByteArrayResource(drl.getBytes())
                .setSourcePath("rule.drl")
                .setResourceType(ResourceType.DRL));

        KieBuilder kieBuilder = kieServices.newKieBuilder(kieFileSystem).buildAll();
        if (kieBuilder.getResults().hasMessages(org.kie.api.builder.Message.Level.ERROR)) {
            throw new RuntimeException("Build Errors:\n" + kieBuilder.getResults().toString());
        }

        KieContainer kieContainer = kieServices.newKieContainer(kieBuilder.getKieModule().getReleaseId());

        return kieContainer.newKieSession();
    }

Now when I run the application and executes the new method I get this error:

Build Errors:
Error Messages:
Message id=1, level=ERROR, path=pom.xml, line=0, column=0
text=maven pom.xml found, but unable to read
Unable to parse File pom.xml

This is my pom, I don't know what is wrong with it, I hope you can help me.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0
                             http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">

    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <groupId>com.abctp</groupId>
    <artifactId>abcsoft</artifactId>
    <packaging>jar</packaging>
    <version>24.1.2.0</version>
    <description>abcsoft application</description>
    <url>http://abcd/departments/projects/wiki/</url>
    <name>abcsoft</name>

    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>disable-java8-doclint</id>
            <activation>
                <jdk>1.8</jdk>
            </activation>
            <properties>
                <additionalparam>-Xdoclint:none</additionalparam>
            </properties>
        </profile>
    </profiles>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>windows-1252</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <spring.security.version>3.1.4.RELEASE</spring.security.version>
        <artifact.env>LOCAL</artifact.env>
    </properties>

    <parent>
        <artifactId>swing-app-parent</artifactId>
        <groupId>com.ea.maven</groupId>
        <version>1.0.1</version>
    </parent>

    <ciManagement>

        <url>http://build</url>
        <notifiers>

                <type>mail</type>
                <sendOnError>true</sendOnError>
                <sendOnFailure>true</sendOnFailure>
                <sendOnSuccess>false</sendOnSuccess>
                <sendOnWarning>false</sendOnWarning>
                <configuration>
                    <address>bjs@abctp.com</address>
                </configuration>
            </notifier>
        </notifiers>
    </ciManagement>

    <repositories>

            <id>AsposeJavaAPI</id>
            <name>Aspose Java API</name>
            <url>https://repository.aspose.com/repo/</url>
        </repository>
    </repositories>
    <dependencies>

        </dependency>

        <dependency>

        </dependency>

        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-security-core</artifactId>
            <version>${spring.security.version}</version>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
                    <artifactId>spring-aop</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>

                    <artifactId>spring-asp</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>

                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>

                    <artifactId>spring-context</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>

                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.amazonaws</groupId>
            <artifactId>aws-java-sdk</artifactId>
            <version>1.12.333</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.aspose</groupId>

            <version>19.10</version>
        </dependency>

            <groupId>com.amazonaws</groupId>
            <artifactId>amazon-sqs-java-messaging-lib</artifactId>
            <version>1.0.4</version>
            <type>jar</type>
        </dependency>

    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <sourceDirectory>src</sourceDirectory>
        <testSourceDirectory>test/unit</testSourceDirectory>

        <resources>
            <resource>
                <directory>./</directory>
                <includes>
                    <include>*.properties</include>
                </includes>
            </resource>

            <resource>
                <directory>src</directory>
                <includes>
                    <include>**/*.xml</include>
                    <include>**/*.cfg.xml</include>
                    <include>**/*.jpg</include>
                    <include>**/*.png</include>
                    <include>**/*.gif</include>
                    <include>**/*.properties</include>
                    <include>**/*.txt</include>
                    <include>**/*.xsd</include>
                    <include>**/*.vm</include>
                    <include>**/*.drl</include>
                    <include>**/*.drt</include>
                    <include>**/*.rf</include>
                    <include>**/*.xls</include>
                    <include>**/*.dat</include>
                </includes>
            </resource>

            <resource>
                <directory>resources</directory>
                <includes>
                    <include>**/*.xml</include>
                    <include>**/*.jpg</include>
                    <include>**/*.png</include>
                    <include>**/*.gif</include>
                    <include>**/*.properties</include>
                    <include>**/*.txt</include>
                    <include>**/*.xsd</include>
                    <include>**/*.vm</include>
                    <include>**/*.drl</include>
                    <include>**/*.drt</include>
                    <include>**/*.rf</include>
                    <include>**/*.xls</include>
                    <include>**/*.dat</include>
                    <include>**/*.ortho</include>
                </includes>
            </resource>

            <resource>
                <directory>resources</directory>
                <includes>
                    <include>**/*.properties</include>
                </includes>
                <filtering>true</filtering>
            </resource>
        </resources>
        <testResources>
            <testResource>
                <directory>./</directory>
                <includes>
                    <include>*.properties</include>
                </includes>
            </testResource>

            <testResource>
                <directory>test/unit</directory>
                <includes>
                    <include>**/*.xml</include>
                    <include>**/*.jpg</include>
                    <include>**/*.png</include>
                    <include>**/*.gif</include>
                    <include>**/*.properties</include>
                    <include>**/*.txt</include>
                    <include>**/*.xsd</include>
                    <include>**/*.sql</include>
                    <include>**/*.vm</include>
                    <include>**/*.drl</include>
                    <include>**/*.drt</include>
                    <include>**/*.rf</include>
                    <include>**/*.xls</include>
                </includes>
            </testResource>
        </testResources>

        <plugins>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.7.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                    <encoding>windows-1252</encoding>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.2.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <descriptors>
                        <descriptor>assembly/assembly.xml</descriptor>
                    </descriptors>
                    <finalName>iris2-${project.version}</finalName>
                    <!--<outputDirectory>${outputDirectory}</outputDirectory>-->
                    <workDirectory>${outputDirectory}/assembly/work
                    </workDirectory>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <mainClass>com.abctp.app.client.ClientMain</mainClass>
                            <addClasspath>true</addClasspath>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>single</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.3.2</version>
                <configuration>
                    <archive>
                        <manifest>
                            <mainClass>com.abctp.app.client.ClientMain
                            </mainClass>
                        </manifest>
                    </archive>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-site-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <reportPlugins>
                        <plugin>
                            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                            <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                            <configuration>
                                <!--<additionalparam>-Xdoclint:none</additionalparam>-->
                                <siteDirectory>${basedir}/site</siteDirectory>
                            </configuration>
                        </plugin>
                    </reportPlugins>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.9</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar</goal>
                        </goals>
                        <configuration>
                            <minmemory>128m</minmemory>
                            <maxmemory>1g</maxmemory>
                            <!--<additionalparam>-Xdoclint:none</additionalparam>-->
                        </configuration>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.17</version>
                <configuration>
                    <argLine>-Xms128m -Xmx256m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m</argLine>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-failsafe-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.17</version>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>external.atlassian.jgitflow</groupId>
                <artifactId>jgitflow-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.0-m5.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <flowInitContext>
                        <masterBranchName>master</masterBranchName>
                        <developBranchName>develop</developBranchName>
                        <featureBranchPrefix>feature/</featureBranchPrefix>
                        <releaseBranchPrefix>release/</releaseBranchPrefix>
                        <hotfixBranchPrefix>hotfix/</hotfixBranchPrefix>
                        <versionTagPrefix>version-</versionTagPrefix>
                    </flowInitContext>
                    <noDeploy>false</noDeploy>
                    <squash>false</squash>
                    <scmCommentPrefix>[RELEASE] </scmCommentPrefix>
                    <enableSshAgent>true</enableSshAgent>
                    <pushReleases>true</pushReleases>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>

                <groupId>org.owasp</groupId>

                <artifactId>dependency-check-maven</artifactId>

                <version>9.0.9</version>

                <executions>

                    <execution>

                        <goals>

                            <goal>check</goal>

                        </goals>

                    </execution>

                </executions>

            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>
